home.title: All Your Requirements in One Place
home.subscribe: Discover the ultimate convenience with our service-based website, where all home-related services can be found in a single place. Whether you need plumbing, electrical work, cleaning, or renovation services, we've got you covered.
home.subscribe_subtitle: Subscribe now to stay updated on the latest services and offers!

profile.logout_msg_detailed: You’ve been doing great things!Logging out will pause your current session, but don’t worry, all your progress is saved. We’ll be here, ready for you to pick up right where you left off when you return.
